title: Get Started in 3 Steps
description: Transform your repository into an AI agent in minutes

step1.title: Initialize Config
step1.description: Run the init command at your project root. This generates `Agent.md` (Agent Instructions) and config files, giving your repository a unique personality and permission boundaries.

step2.title: Wake Up Runtime
step2.description: Start the Agent Runtime locally. It takes over the repo's read/write capabilities and connects to your chat apps (e.g., Telegram), standing by as a team member.

step3.title: Collaborate Naturally
step3.description: Forget complex CLIs. Chat with your Agent like a human colleague. Use natural language or slash commands (e.g., `/status`) to assign tasks, refactor code, or ask questions.
